findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The smart contract allows minting of an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Unsecured approve function
findings.description: The approve function is unsecured, allowing unauthorized access and potential token manipulation.

findings.title: Unsecured transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function does not have any access control or validation checks, allowing anyone to transfer tokens.

findings.title: Unsecured transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unsecured and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unsecured permit function
findings.description: The permit function allows unauthorized access to sensitive operations.

findings.title: Unsecured mint function
findings.description: The mint function is unsecured, allowing unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unsecured burn function
findings.description: The burnTokens function is unsecured and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unsecured swap function
findings.description: The swap functions (swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens) do not have proper security measures in place.

findings.title: Unsecured skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unsecured, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Unsecured sync function
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unsecured initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function is unsecured, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of contract state.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: The smart contract has an active ownership which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization hacks.

findings.title: Unsecured enableTrading function
findings.description: The enableTrading function is unsecured and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unsecured authorizeWallet function
findings.description: The authorizeWallet function lacks proper security measures, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unsecured increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unsecured and can potentially lead to unauthorized allowance increases.

findings.title: Unsecured decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unsecured and can potentially lead to unauthorized allowance decreases.

findings.title: Unsecured deliver function
findings.description: The deliver function is unsecured.

findings.title: Unsecured excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function is unsecured and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized exclusion of addresses from rewards.

findings.title: Unsecured includeInReward function
findings.description: The includeInReward function is unsecured and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: _burn function
findings.description: The burnTokens function allows burning tokens without any access control, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Unsecured excludeFromFee function
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function is unsecured and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unsecured includeInFee function
findings.description: The includeInFee function is unsecured and can be exploited to manipulate fees.

findings.title: Unsecured excludedFromMaxTxAmount function
findings.description: The excludedFromMaxTxAmount function is unsecured and may allow unauthorized access or manipulation of max transaction amounts.

findings.title: Unsecured includeInMaxTxAmount function
findings.description: The includeInMaxTxAmount function lacks proper security measures, potentially leading to unauthorized access or manipulation of max transaction amounts.

findings.title: Unsecured excludedFromExternalTokenMinAmount function
findings.description: The excludedFromExternalTokenMinAmount function lacks proper security measures, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unsecured includeInExternalTokenMinAmount function
findings.description: The includeInExternalTokenMinAmount function is unsecured and can be exploited by an attacker.
